QuestData.Title: Shipwreck Searching
QuestData.Description: $g Hey handsome, welcome back! You wouldn't mind running another errand, would you? I'd be EVER so grateful...: You! Stop right there, you tramp! I'm not finished with you yet.;$b$bI hear you're headed off to the shore east of here. The beach is filled with crashed ships, and those ships have gnomish tools in them... tools that I can use.$b$b$g See you soon, beefcake!: Get cracking, missy!;
QuestData.CompletionText: $g Has my knight in shining armor returned?: Well?;
QuestData.RewardText: $g You really know how to treat a girl, you know that? If you ever need anything...: Well, I suppose you're not completely useless. Now stay away from my men!;
